name: Path T Melanoma Tongue Base
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  Assign 88 for in situ cases (behavior code /2). TNM does not include an in situ category for mucosal melanoma tumors.

**Note 2:**  Mucosal melanomas are aggressive tumors, therefore, T1 and T2 are omitted, as are Stages I and II.

**Note 3:**  The intrinsic muscles of tongue are four paired muscles within the tongue which control its shape.  The extrinsic muscles originate from structures outside the tongue and control its positioning.

**Note 4:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available or for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.

**Note 5:**  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.
footnotes:
\* T4 [NOS] is not defined by UICC in the 7th edition. Approval has been provided by UICC to use "Tumor invades bone, nerve or extrinsic deep muscles" as T4 [NOS].
\# TX, T0 and T4 [NOS] are not defined in AJCC 7th edition.
